title: The Dopest Olympic Team Ever, Will Climate Change Shrink Our Bodies? 12.6.17
itunes:title: The Dopest Olympic Team Ever, Will Climate Change Shrink Our Bodies? 12.6.17
description:
In episode 42, Miles and guest co-host super producer Anna are joined by comedian Howard Kremer to discuss tipping at restaurants, climate change, the Olympics banning Russia, a new suicide box, plus a call from fire correspondent Jack O'Brien.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
